string.text:
A small wall made of wooden planks, measuring approximately 2 meters by 3 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Structural Foundation

A large wall made of wooden planks, measuring approximately 5 meters by 3 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Structural Foundation

A wooden wall and doorway, measuring approximately 5 meters by 3 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Compatible door: 100x190cm
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Structural Foundation

A sturdy metal sheet wall, measuring approximately 2 meters by 3 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Structural Foundation

A large wall made of tin roofing, measuring approximately 5 meters by 3 meters.

 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Structural Foundation

A large wall made of tin roofing with an opening for a door, measuring approximately 5 meters by 3 meters.
